text: Aur jo kuch inn kay dilon mein (keena) tha hum uss ko door ker den gay. Inn kay neechay nehren jari hongi. Aur woh log kahen gay kay Allah ka (lakh lakh) shukar hai jiss ney hum ko iss moqam tak phonchaya aur humari kabhi rasaee na hoti agar Allah Taalaa hum ko na pehchanta. Waqaee humaray rab kay payghumbar sachi baaten ley ker aaye thay. Aur inn say pukar ker kaha jayega iss jannata kay tum waris banaye gaye ho apney aemaal kay badlay
